dsOverview.title: NESS Visual and Infrared Brightness Analyses, 1974-1998

summary.p: This dataset contains NESS solar and infrared radiation data on global 2.5 degree latitude-longitude grids and 125-by-125 polar stereographic grids. The data is derived from data from the NOAA polar orbiting satellites.
